Test Case Description: Verify user can login with valid credentials
Preconditions:
User account exists
  Backend is running
Test Steps:
1. Open Postman
2. Select 'Login (Get Token)' request
3. Enter username: 'admin'
4. Enter password: '123123123'
5. Click Send

Test Case Description: Verify login fails with wrong password
Preconditions:
User account exists
  Backend is running
Test Steps:
1. Open Postman
2. Select 'Login (Get Token)' request
3. Enter username: 'admin'
4. Enter password: 'wrongpassword'
5. Click Send
Expected Result:
Status: 401 
 Error message: Unauthorized

Test Case Description: Verify login fails with non existent username
Test Steps:
1. Open Postman
2. Select 'Login (Get Token)' request
3. Enter username: 'nonexistuser'
4. Enter password: 'anypassword'
5. Click Send
Expected Result:
Status: 404 
  Error message: User not found
Actual Result:
Status: 404 
  Error message: User not found

Test Case Description: Verify login fails with empty fields
Test Steps:
1. Open Postman
2. Select 'Login (Get Token)' request
3. Leave username empty
4. Leave password empty
5. Click Send
Expected Result:
Status: 400 Bad Request
  Validation error message

Test Case Description: Verify token validation works with valid token
Preconditions:
User is logged in
  Valid token exists
Test Steps:
1. Login first to get token
2. Select 'Introspect Token' request
3. Token is auto filled from {{access_token}}
4. Click Send
Expected Result:
Status: 200 OK
  Response: { valid: true }

Test Steps:
1. Login first
2. Select 'Logout' request
3. Click Send
Expected Result:
Status: 200 OK
  Token is invalidated

Test Steps:
1. Login first
2. Select 'Change Password' request
3. Enter old and new password
4. Click Send
Test Data:
Old Password: admin123
New Password: newpassword123
Expected Result:
Status: 200 OK
  Password changed successfully

Preconditions:
Backend is running
  Email not registered yet
Test Steps:
1. Select 'Register New User' request
2. Fill all required fields
3. Click Send
Test Data:
Username: newuser
Email: new@example.com
Password: password123
Full Name: Test User
Expected Result:
Status: 200 OK
  User created successfully
  User ID returned

Test Case Description: Verify registration fails with existing username
Test Steps:
1. Select 'Register New User' request
2. Use existing username
3. Click Send
Expected Result:
Status: 400 Bad Request
  Error: Username already exists

Test Case Description: Verify registration fails with invalid email
Test Steps:
1. Select 'Register New User' request
2. Enter invalid email format
3. Click Send
Expected Result:
Status: 400 Bad Request
  Validation error for email

Test Case Description: Verify admin can get all users
Test Steps:
1. Login as admin
2. Select 'Get All Users' request
3. Click Send
Expected Result:
Status: 200 OK
  Array of users returned

Test Case Description: Verify non admin cannot get all users
Test Steps:
1. Login as customer
2. Select 'Get All Users' request
3. Click Send
Expected Result:
Status: 403 Forbidden
  Access denied message

Test Case Description: Verify customer can cancel their order
Preconditions:
User logged in
  Order in CREATED or CONFIRMED status
Test Steps:
1. Login as customer
2. Select 'Cancel Order'
3. Use order ID
4. Click Send
Expected Result:
Status: 200 OK
  Order status  CANCELLED
  Stock restored

Test Steps:
1. Login as customer
2. Try to cancel delivered order
3. Click Send
Expected Result:
Status: 400 Bad Request
  Error: Cannot cancel delivered order

2. Try to set status to CANCELLED
3. Click Send
